alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Dust Advisory issued June 30 at 5:47PM MST until June 30 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Dust Advisory for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 645 PM MST. * At 546 PM MST, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 7 miles north of Freeman to 10 miles south of Estrella Sailport to 14 miles south of Maricopa, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Less than one mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Doppler radar. IMPACT...Hazardous travel. * This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 8 between mile markers 146 and 159. AZ Route 238 between mile markers 31 and 44. AZ Route 347 between mile markers 161 and 175. Locations impacted include... Maricopa, Estrella Sailport, Stanfield, Mobile and Ak-Chin Village. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Blowing dust brings reduced visibility, leading to dangerous driving conditions. If driving, avoid blowing dust if possible. If caught in dense blowing dust, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.
